text:
I personally have had many issues with upgrades, and they usually showed up some
time after… 
I still have a server that won’t accept windows updates that I have to rebuild
as soon as I can get that group to give me a maintenance window…

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Extended Security Updates for Server 2012R2
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from thedobc@gmail.com. Learn why this is important
[https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
I personally have had many issues with upgrades, and they usually showed up some
time after… 
I still have a server that won’t accept windows updates that I have to rebuild
as soon as I can get that group to give me a maintenance window…
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/025201da5b88%2427726820%2476573860%24%40gmail.com
